overview: Sara, a fifty-year-old trans woman, can no longer just be herself when she is locked up in her house, secretly. She needs the world to see her as she really is and she is about to go out on the street for the first time. Throughout her walk through the streets of the city she will face the prejudices of a society that does not let her be who she is, she will fight against her fears and insecurities and will live with a world that surpasses her and makes her have to be braver. never.
title: More Than Brave
